Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: red wolf muzzle
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: Following exposure to mutagenic mechanites, a slender red wolf snout has replaced this pawn's face completely with a set of fangs and pointed teeth. It's perfect for biting and tearing through meat, but depending on the exact form the mutation has taken it may severely hampen their ability to speak.

li.label: bestial
li.description: A slender, red wolf snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, completely with a set of fangs and pointed teeth. Almost no human traits remain, making speech incredibly difficult. Many people find [PAWN_possessive] fangs and [PAWN_possessive] tendency to growl rather than talk intimidating
[PAWN_nameDef]'s face seems to be changing, the nose and jaw pressing out and looking decidedly more animalistic.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s face has grown into a stubby animal muzzle. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are starting to grow out into fangs, and the skin of [PAWN_possessive] nose has grown black and rough.

A slender, red wolf snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, completely with a set of fangs and pointed teeth. The tongue and lips retain some flexibility which allows [PAWN_objective] a rough form of speech, though it'll take [PAWN_objective] some time to get used to it.

A slender, red wolf snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, completely with a set of fangs and pointed teeth. The tongue and lips retain some flexibility allowing [PAWN_objective] a passable form of speech now that [PAWN_pronoun] has gotten used to it.
li.label: adapted
paragon
li.description: A slender, red wolf snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, completely with a set of fangs and pointed teeth. It manages to blend human and wolf traits elegently, allowing [PAWN_objective] to speak as well as any human despite the muzzle. It's smaller and less intimidating shape compared to other wolf muzzles lend some to even call it cute.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: lupine (Red Wolf)
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A large, fuzzy ear that belongs to a red wolf, which has found its way onto this (un)fortunate pawn through the application of mutagenic mechanites. It can hear much better than a normal human ear, and some say it looks cute too.

li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s ears are noticably pointed, making [PAWN_objective] look a bit like an elf.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s ears are growing flatter and pointier like an animal's, and have begun to migrate toward the top of [PAWN_possessive] head. They're starting to get noticably more sensitive to match.

Large, fuzzy wolf ears crown [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, flicking and turning independently at the slightest sound of prey. They tend to fold back any time [PAWN_nameDef] finds [PAWN_objective]self nervous or uncertain. [PAWN_nameDef] has yet to get used to them and so the slightest sound tends to distract [PAWN_pronoun] from [PAWN_possessive] work.

li.label: adapted
li.description: Large, fuzzy wolf ears crown [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, flicking and turning independently at the slightest sound of prey. They tend to fold back any time [PAWN_nameDef] finds [PAWN_objective]self nervous or uncertain. [PAWN_nameDef] has grown used to the sensitivity and is no longer distracted by it.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: red wolf tail
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: Due to exposure to mutagenic mechanites, this pawn now has a tail that would ordinarily belong to a red wolf. It's not good for much other than betraying its owner's mood, but it does slightly help them balance.

li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is starting to grow a tail. It's still short for now, but pretty soon [PAWN_pronoun] is going to need to cut a tail-hole in [PAWN_possessive] pants.
[PAWN_nameDef] has a short and slender tail. It's long enough to get in the way but not quite long enough to be useful.

A slender red wolf-like tail hangs from [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine. It's cute, but it really gets in the way and tends to betray [PAWN_possessive] mood at the worst times. [PAWN_pronoun] will get better with it after some practice.

li.label: adapted
li.description: A slender red wolf-like tail hangs from [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine. It's cute, and now that [PAWN_nameDef] is used to it, it helps [PAWN_pronoun] a bit with balance. [PAWN_pronoun] has even developed a bit of a "poker tail", meaning [PAWN_possessive] can avoid giving away [PAWN_possessive] mood when trying to trade or during poker night.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: lupine
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: Golden- or orange-colored wolf eyes with a large, black-ringed iris. They look striking, especially on a mutated human, but alas they are red-green colorblind. They have inferior visual acuity compared to a human's eyes, but they're well adapted to noticing motion.

li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s eyes are turning gold. Striking, but so far the change doesn't seem to have any practical effect.
[PAWN_nameDef]'s eyes have lost their ability to differentiate red and green as they become increasingly wolflike.

[PAWN_nameDef] now has a striking set of gold-colored wolf eyes. They're quite intimidating, but alas [PAWN_pronoun] is now red-green colorblind and can't quite see fine details as well. With some practice, [PAWN_pronoun] should be able to partially adapt.

li.label: adapted
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] now has a striking set of gold-colored wolf eyes. They're quite intimidating, but alas [PAWN_pronoun] is now red-green colorblind. [PAWN_possessive] fine detail vision suffers, but the extra extra motion sensitivity gives [PAWN_objective] a better sense of [PAWN_possessive] prey's movement when hunting.
